ability.description: Choose a character to kill. If that character is chosen by another player, that player can't do anything in their turn.
Choose a character to steal from. If that character is chosen by another player, you steal all of their gold.
Swap your building cards with a player of your choosing.
In the upcoming turn, you can pick your character first and see what character(s) gets put away for that turn.
Your buildings cannot be destroyed by the Warlord this turn.
You can grab an extra coin when it's your turn.
You can grab an extra 2 building cards when it's your turn.
You can destroy a building of choice (except the Bishop's) with it's value minus 1 coin.
